attributes.action: Outlaw the use of Canned Laughter on TV Programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Canned Laughter is annoying when you are trying to listen to something that is supposed to be funny on TV. The programme producers think people are too thick to know what is supposed to be funny, so use canned laughter as a prompt for us to laugh. The use of canned laughter spoils the enjoyment in watching comedy on TV.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
